SYSTEM: OEG_Status_report_Software_March_2022.pdf: Página 5
Open Science, Software and AI: A year at the Ontology Engineering Group. March, 2022
Reusability takes time, even when sources are available
5
In [1] we tried to reproduce an eﬀort 
from one year before.
-
All data were available online
-
All tools were available online (except 
one, but authors had a replacement)
-
> 250 hrs to full reproducibility
-
> 100 hrs to get familiar with the tools 
and their I/O
Tool 1
Tool 2
Tool 3
[1] Garijo, D., Kinnings, S., Xie, L., Xie, L., Zhang, Y., Bourne, P. E., & Gil, Y. (2013). Quantifying reproducibility 
in computational biology: the case of the tuberculosis drugome. PloS one, 8(11), e80278.
